snippet: Jacques Servier and six companies of the Servier group were charged in a case involving a diabetes and weight-loss drug that caused cardiovascular damage.
abstract: Jacques Servier and six companies of his Servier group are charged with manslaughter in French case involving diabetes and weight-loss drug Mediator, which caused cardiovascular damage.
lead_paragraph: Jacques Servier and six companies of the Servier group were charged in a case involving a diabetes and weight-loss drug that caused cardiovascular damage.
